tool_description: Parses and structures raw patient symptom descriptions into standardized medical terminology and categories for clinical analysis.

parse_severity.description: Whether to extract severity indicators from the description

error_messages: Empty symptom description: Provide a non-empty symptom description.
Invalid input format: Symptom description must be a text string.
Parsing failed: Unable to extract meaningful symptom information from the provided text.
usage: Provide a free-text symptom description. The tool will parse and structure the symptoms using medical terminology and return standardized symptom categories.
